PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-09962010-08-04,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectBernard J. Manton ** RETIREMENTAND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of a lifelong annuity to the Hon. BERNARD J. MANTON, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective October 30, 2010.
AttachmentsAttachment
